definitions.text: the vessel that contains the seeds of a plant (not the seeds themselves)
lean white flesh of important North Atlantic food fish; usually baked or poached
major food fish of Arctic and cold-temperate waters

examples: The immigrant was duped because he trusted everyone

definitions.text: harass with persistent criticism or carping
examples: The children teased the new teacher
Don't ride me so hard over my failure
His fellow workers razzed him when he wore a jacket and tie

definitions.text: payable by the recipient on delivery
